[aiida.cmdline]
aiida-scheduler = aiida_scheduler.cli.cmd_aiida_scheduler:aiida_scheduler

[aiida.data]
scheduler.scheduler = aiida_scheduler.orm.scheduler:SchedulerNode

[aiida_gui.plugins]
scheduler = aiida_scheduler.backend:plugin

[console_scripts]
aiida-scheduler = aiida_scheduler.cli.cmd_aiida_scheduler:aiida_scheduler
